articles.description: Apple’s range of M5 products has a new chip — and little else to entice typical shoppers. Also: The company’s AI division brain drain continues, and Apple gears up to launch a touch-screen MacBook Pro.
articles.content: Apples range of M5 products has a new chip and little else to entice typical shoppers. Also: The companys AI division brain drain continues, and Apple gears up to launch a touch-screen MacBook Pro. … [+96 chars]
